sentences.de: Heute bin ich zehn Jahre alt.
sentences.en: Today I am ten years old.

sentences.en: My family made breakfast for me.

sentences.de: Es gab Kuchen schon am Morgen!
sentences.en: There was cake already in the morning!
In the afternoon five friends came.

sentences.de: Das war der beste Geburtstag meines Lebens.
sentences.en: That was the best birthday of my life.
